Verses: 1 neengal Pizhaiththup Perugi, Karththar Ungal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththile Piravesiththu, Adhaich Sudhandharikkumbadi Naan Indru Ungalukku Vidhikkira Ellaak Kattalaigalaigalinpadiyum Seyyadh Saavadhaanamaayiruppeergalaaga.

2 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnaich Sirumaippaduththumbadikkum, Thammudaiya Kattalaigalai Nee Kaikkolvaayo Kaikkollamaattaayo Endru Avar Unnaich Sodhiththu, Un Irudhayaththilulladhai Nee Ariyumbadikkum, Unnai Indha Naarpadhu Varushamalavum Vanaandharaththile Nadaththivandha Ellaa Vazhiyaiyum Ninaippaayaaga.

3 avar Unnaich Sirumaippaduththi, Unnaip Pasiyinaal Varuththi, Manushan Appaththinaal Maaththiram Alla, Karththarudaiya Vaayilirundhu Purappadugira Ovvoru Vaarththaiyinaalum Pizhaippaan Enbadhai Unakku Unarththumbadikku, Neeyum Un Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadhirundha Mannaavinaal Unnaip Poshiththaar.
4 indha Naarpadhu Varushamum Unmelirundha Vasthiram Pazhaiyadhaaippogavumillai, Un Kaal Veengavum Illai.
5 oruvan Than Puththiranaich Sitchikkiradhupola Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnaich Sitchikkiraar Endru Nee Un Irudhayaththil Arindhukolvaayaaga.
6 aagaiyaal, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Vazhigalil Nadandhu, Avarukkup Bayappadumbadikku, Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollakkadavaai.
7 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Nalla Dhesaththile Piravesikkappannugiraar; Adhu Pallaththaakkugalilum Malaigalilumirundhu Purappadugira Aarugalum Ootrugalum Erigalumulla Dhesam;
8 adhu Kodhumaiyum Vaarkodhumaiyum Thiraatchach Chedigalum Aththimarangalum Maadhalanchedigalumulla Dhesam; Adhu Olivamarangalum, Enneyum Thenumulla Dhesam;
9 adhu Thaazhchchiyillaamal Appam Pusikkaththakkadhum Ondrum Unakkuk Kuraivupadaadhadhumaana Dhesam; Adhu Kallukal Irumbaayirukkiradhum, Sembu Vetti Edukkaththakka Malaigalulladhumaana Dhesam.
10 aagaiyaal, Nee Pusiththuth Thirupthiyadaindhirukkaiyil, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Koduththa Andha Nalla Dhesaththukkaaga Avarai Sthoththirikkakkadavaai.
11 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Maravaadhabadikkum, Naan Indru Unakku Vidhikkira Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Niyaayangalaiyum Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkollaamalpogaadhabadikkum Echcharikkaiyaayiru.
12 nee Pusiththuth Thirupthiyaagi, Nalla Veedugalaik Katti, Avaigalil Kudiyirukkumpodhum,
13 un Aadumaadugal Thiratchiyaagi, Unakku Velliyum Ponnum Perugi, Unakku Undaanavaiyellaam Varththikkumpodhum,
14 un Irudhayam Mettimaiyadaiyaamalum, Unnai Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninavarum,

15 unnudaiya Pinnaatkalil Unakku Nanmai Seyyumporuttu, Unnaich Sirumaippaduththi, Unnaich Sodhiththu, Kollivaaich Sarppangalum Thelkalum, Thanneerillaadha Varatchiyumulla Bayangaramaana Periya Vanaandharavazhiyaai Unnai Azhaiththuvandhavarum, Unakkaagap Paaraiyaana Kanmalaiyilirundhu Thanneer Purappadappanninavarum.
16 un Pidhaakkal Ariyaadha Mannaavinaal Vanaandharaththile Unnaip Poshiththu Vandhavarumaana Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nee Maravaamalum,
17 en Saamarththiyamum En Kaibelanum Indha Aisuvariyaththai Enakkuch Sambaadhiththadhu Endru Nee Un Irudhayaththil Sollikkollaamalum Irukka Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu,

18 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Ninaippaayaaga; Avare Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittukkoduththa Thammudaiya Udanbadikkaiyai Urudhippaduththumbadi, Innaalil Unakku Undaayirukkiradhupola, Aisuvariyaththaich Sambaadhikkiradharkaana Belanai Unakkuk Kodukkiravar.

19 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nee Marandhu, Vere Dhevargalaip Pinpatri Avargalaich Seviththu, Avargalaip Panindhu Kolvaayaanaal, Nichchayamaai Azhindhupoveergal Endru Indru Ungalukkuch Saatchiyaai Arivikkiren.
20 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththirku Neengal Keezhppadiyaamalpovadhinaal, Karththar Ungalukku Munbaaga Azhiththa Jaadhigalaippola Neengalum Azhiveergal.
